overview:
Tim is the VP of Technology at XLNTads.com. Tim’s career spans the better part of 15 years, from his earlier years helping to shape and define what the internet was in terms of a platform for both business and innovation to most recently leading teams of programmers, artists & writers in organized, combined efforts to realize a single creative vision.

Tim most recently served as the Director of Technology for the Philadelphia office of Digitas, Inc. an interactive services company whose fortune 100 clientele demanded both technical and creative excellence

Prior to Digitas Tim spent time in various Philadelphia interactive agencies helping to define the interactive landscape, working with names such as: Pfizer, Discovery Channel, Universal Studios, AstraZeneca, Merrill Lynch etc. The agency world is, as Tim describes it, “creative driven” as such technology’s role must be both reliable and innovative.
